recipesJson.name: Claim Your Clone
recipesJson.author: KylezKloudz
recipesJson.description:
A remixed version of "Claim Your Throne" by King's Crown aka Suicide Bunny... This is another that is widely posted by bunches of mixers across the interwebs, so I don't know where to give original credit to... 

Definitely don't think it's a real clone, but it's a tasty remix... Enjoy!

reviews.text: I used FW Butter Ripple because it is what I had on hand but amazing...so simple but so good.  Good right off the mixing board but so much better when steeped.  Love to you...Love to all...Kitten.....Yummy
